welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villers-les-Nancy, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Metz-nancy-lorraine Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
